description.value: Your team works together to set an enemy up for a vicious attack. Signal one squadmate affected by your commander's banner who has an opponent within their reach. That ally can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.lOE4yjUnETTdaf2T]{Reposition} an opponent as a free action. If their maneuver is successful and the target ends their movement adjacent to you or a different squadmate, you or the second squadmate can attempt a melee Strike against that target as a reaction.
